thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simple Fixes
thread.title_full: Simple Fixes - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: brianlG9912LJ
title: Simple Fixes
text: The staff didn't bother to make sure things in the room worked. The TV was broken and the US electrical outlet did not work. I had to call the front desk twice before they resolved the electrical outlet issue. The shower water was ice cold one morning. The front desk refused to accept one of my credit cards because "the numbers on the card are flat, not raised."
